sentences.sContent: He was punished for his impertinence.
sentences.sCn: 他为自己的粗鲁无礼遭到了惩罚。

remMethod.val: im(不) + pertinence(恰当， 适当) → 行为不恰当 → 无礼

words.tran: 不恰当的；无礼的；粗鲁的；不相干的
不切题地；不恰当地；不礼貌地

trans.tranOther: If someone talks or behaves in a rather impolite and disrespectful way, you can call this behaviour impertinence or an impertinence
